intro: Crotalaria kanchiana, commonly known as Kanchan kachni, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the family Fabaceae, also known as the legume or pea family. The plant is characterized by its distinctive yellow flowers and compound leaves. It produces pod-like fruits that contain several seeds. Crotalaria kanchiana is often cultivated for its ornamental value and has traditional uses in some cultures.
